name: @wireio/protoc-gen-solidity
description: protoc plugin generating Solidity encode/decode libraries from protobuf3 definitions

scripts.dist: pnpm build && pnpm bundle && pkg -c package.json --output dist/bin/protoc-gen-solidity -d -t node24-linux --options experimental-require-module dist/bundle/protoc-gen-solidity.mjs
scripts.generate:test: npm run dist && mkdir -p ./dist/tests/generated && npx protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-solidity=./dist/bin/protoc-gen-solidity --solidity_out=./dist/tests/generated tests/protos/*.proto
